briefTitle: The Efficacy Of Diclectin® For Nausea And Vomiting Of Pregnancy
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, Multicenter, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Trial Of The Efficacy Of Diclectin® For Nausea And Vomiting Of Pregnancy
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Diclectin® (doxylamine succinate USP 10 mg and pyridoxine HCl 10 mg) is more effective at controlling the nausea and vomiting of pregnancy than a placebo.

primaryOutcome.measure: Diclectin Versus Placebo for Treatment of Nausea and Vomiting of Pregnancy (NVP) as Measured by the Change in Pregnancy Unique-Quantification of Emesis (PUQE) Overall Score of Symptoms From Baseline (Day 1) to End of Study Visit (Day 15).
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline (Day 1) to End of Study Visit Day 15 (± 1 day)
